titleStmt.title: The unconscionable gallant: or, The beautiful lady's misfortune. To the tune of, Fond boy, &c. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C[harles]. Nates [i.e. Bates], at the White-Hart in West-Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Verse: "Now I pray you attend, to the lines that are penn'd ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
